promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young epic beetle psychic-type pokemon with a galaxy-pattern crystal core. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or beetle. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystarva, a a chibi young epic beetle psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Moon's Eclipse-GX, Star Shield-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "beetle", "psychic" or "Crystarva". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, beetle-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: This charming lunar entity, dwelling in cavernous habitats, harnesses the night's prowess with Moon's Eclipse-GX and Star Shield-GX.
